website_summaries.verdict: Designed to optimize weight management and weight loss, these capsules contain a concentrated amount of chlorogenic acids, which are antioxidants that stabilize the body’s blood sugar levels.
pros: Contains about 20 milligrams of caffeine, about as much as a cup of decaffeinated coffee
Decaffeinated to help avoid feeling jittery
cons: Some users have not experienced any benefits, even with extended use

customer_reviews.title: You get a free bottle for a good review. Spend money somewhere else
customer_reviews.text: I/m sorry but these don't work. Don't let the reviews fool you. You get a free bottle for a good review. Spend money somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far I have been very satisfied and have noticed several benefits
customer_reviews.text: I started on green coffee bean about a month ago. So far I have been very satisfied and have noticed several benefits. It has curbed my appetite throughout the day, given me more energy, and I have dropped around five pounds! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and would recommend for anyone struggling to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a month now and am already seeing results! I love this product and would recommend for anyone struggling to lose weight but doesn’t have much free time to exercise daily
customer_reviews.author: Becca M.

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend going to a store such as Vitamin Shoppe or ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 137 pounds, work out 3-4 days per week. The first week of taking this product, I experienced more fatigue than ever. It did nothing for me. I would recommend going to a store such as Vitamin Shoppe or GNC where a refund or store credit may be honored if you are dissatisfied with a product. THIS SELLER WILL NOT ISSUE A REFUND. I will not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product so far. I have taken Green Coffee bean in the past and it worked really well, specifically, it seemed to burn the stubborn fat around my mid section. It also curves craving and appetite. I haven't taken it in years though. So after buying NatureWise Green coffee bean extract, I have experienced the same great results I expected. I have lost 3 pounds in the last 2 weeks and have noticed my stomach is flatter ( along with exorcise and healthy eating). I will definitely continue buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Noble

customer_reviews.title: I feel like this is going to only continue to give me ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been taking this for just over a couple weeks and I have definitely noticed a change in my arms and face. I feel like this is going to only continue to give me amazing results by targeting trouble areas.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie

customer_reviews.title: ... a boost of energy without the jitters or feeling like you might commit murder - these green coffee capsules ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a boost of energy without the jitters or feeling like you might commit murder - these green coffee capsules are amazing. There is no nervous feeling like you've had too much caffeine. You just simply feel like you got a full 8 hours and are full of energy and raring to go. My husband will joke with me when he gets up (he gets to sleep two hours later than me) when the laundry and dishes are done and the kitchen is spotless "did you have your green coffee this morning hon?" :) Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sheer Miracle

customer_reviews.title: It also Lowered my Blood Sugar
customer_reviews.text: I am a big guy, over 300 lbs, and Diabetic. I mainly bought the green coffee beans along with Garcinia Camogia pills to loose some weight. But regardless of the weight loss, for my surprise, it lowered my blood sugar to normal levels without even even taking my medications. Now I feel more energetic and celebrating my first 5 lbs lost in a week . Thanks a lot.
customer_reviews.author: VB worm

customer_reviews.title: Helpful addition
customer_reviews.text: I added this to my workout and diet routine along with Garcinia and CLA. I believe the Green Coffee Bean gave me a pleasant and constant energy boost throughout the day. I did lose 20lbs over 4 months, I started counting my macros, tracking everything I ate, working out more, and I added these products when my routine plateaued. I believe the green coffee bean helped me on those days that I was lethargic and wanted to skip a workout.
customer_reviews.author: Heph N.

customer_reviews.title: which I like.
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this green coffee bean extract for about 3 weeks. The bottle says to take twice a day 30 min before a meal. There have been several times when I didn't have the pills with me to take before I ate so I have taken them later. I haven't really noticed any weight loss, but this could be because I haven't been taking them exactly as the instructions say to. I do think they suppress the appetite a little though. The brand is high quality with no fillers or artificial ingredients and I haven't had any negative side effects from taking it. The product is also made in the US, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Ewert

customer_reviews.title: This did absolutely nothing for me.
customer_reviews.text: I don't expect a miracle pill. I only have about 10 pounds to lose. However, I thought this would help control my appetite. It did not. I used it for two weeks, with absolutely no appetite suppressing at all. Would have been great if it helped control my cravings. I wish I could send it back.
customer_reviews.author: ~purplemoon~

customer_reviews.title: It's been working great for me
customer_reviews.text: It's been working great for me. I work in an office, and sometimes have trouble feeling awake and motivated. I take Green Coffee Bean 1-2 times a day right before a meal, and it gets me through my day perfectly without the caffeine crash of actual coffee. I can definitely tell the difference in my energy levels when I forget to take it. This is a great product with a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazed at how well it works
customer_reviews.text: I never had a product that completely curb your appetite like this one. It works too well that I need to limit to just once a day. It is weird....you are not hungry even when you are actually hungry! How weird! I am slimming fast on this because food no longer looks appealing...also sad. If you want to use it to aid you to change your eating habit, please go ahead!
customer_reviews.author: M. Chan

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: This is my third course of this product. Combining it with Raspberry Ketones. I lost weight withing first week. For me it worked as diuretic. No other side effects. After a few weeks i don't see any more improvement but keep taking it to reduce the gain of the weight (know it from my past experience).
customer_reviews.author: Chep

customer_reviews.title: Does as Described
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a natural supplement to help me lose post-pregnancy weight faster. It not only helped me lose the weight (combined with a good diet and exercise), but gave me steady energy throughout the day as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail P.

customer_reviews.title: dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for the last month and I have gained weight. I have tried other (cheaper) brands with huge success. I thought that by spending more money on this bottle, it would work as well as other brands that I have tried. this was not the case. do not waste your money. find a cheaper bottle, it will work better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really see any weight loss with this product, but it definitely helped my energy levels. I had no wonky side effects, although it was best not to take before bed so it didn't keep you up. If you're looking for a gentle daily energy boost, without the crash and jitters you get with coffee and energy drinks... I recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great Appetite Support
customer_reviews.text: This product helps me to get up and face the day. I take it about 30 minutes before I eat right before I jump in the shower. I find that it helps to keep my appetite stable and it doesn't make me jittery. I am on my third bottle and I can feel the support it adds to my diet and exercise program. This is important to me as I am fighting type 2 diabetes and this is a great tool.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Cogmon

customer_reviews.title: Lost weight and get a free bottle! 😍
customer_reviews.text: I give this product five stars because I have taken it for almost a month and lost 12 pounds and I have not changed my diet I do drink more water though does not give me the jitters but a boost of energy and helps with my appetite and also The most awesome thing is after you buy this product here on Amazon they send you a little pamphlet in the inside which if you call in they will send you a free bottle and they pay shipping literally free no charge to you whatsoever awesome product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea beard

customer_reviews.title: NatureWise Green Coffee Bean is great for me.
customer_reviews.text: I read everyone else's reviews for this product from NatureWise and I decided to give it a shot. It has been 2 weeks now since I started taking the Green Coffee Bean Extract, I am taking it in combination with another NatureWise product Garcinia. I take just one pill 30min before two of the meals during the day. I am sleeping great, I feel like I have more energy and this product is suppressing my appetite. I am not really tracking my weight, but more importantly, I am basing it on how I feel and I feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Donald C Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Yea, waste of money..
customer_reviews.text: Even with biking 8-16 miles a day and light cardio every other day. Had no effect on my weight loss, in fact I feel it had an opposite effect to where I ended up plateauing on my weight loss goals. One could argue I just reached that point, while I feel it syncs up better time frame wise from when I ordered and started taking this. Also note, after I finished the bottle and let a couple weeks pass, my weight loss resumed
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hacia

customer_reviews.title: If it's as successful in curbing my sweet tooth as the prior brand I will certainly use ...
customer_reviews.text: I have replaced the previous brand of coffee bean extract I was using (I couldn't find it online) and find this brand to be as satisfactory with no side effects after having used it about a week. If it's as successful in curbing my sweet tooth as the prior brand I will certainly use this brand again - and again?
customer_reviews.author: The Curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: Increased energy throughout the day, food cravings disappeared
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this for five days and have noticed increased energy. I am in my late thirties and over the past few years, have noticed a major lack of energy. I had to have a Red Bull to get my day started and then have another to finish the day. Quite an expensive, not to mention unhealthy habit. I have not had a Red Bull in the past five days and have not felt the need for it. I also have noticed that food cravings have gone away. I do not feel jittery. I am also taking garcinia cambogia and the 7 day cleanse. I definitely will continue to use this.
customer_reviews.author: Team Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Broken seal & strong Oder. Had to throw away
customer_reviews.text: I love this product - I’ve been using for about 2 years, HOWEVER the last bottle I ordered the protection seal was broken and the white seal that usually sits on the inside of the cap was missing as well. Every bottle I’ve bought before had these, and I still had my previous bottle to compare. I smelled them and they smelled incredibly strong. I did not smell this when comparing my other bottle which was still half full of pills and I take 2-3 everyday. I had to throw away all of them because I know better than to take pills that have not arrived with the seal still intact.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gilbane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying this product for almost a month now and it is great! I take the Naturewise Green Coffee Bean Extract with the Nature Design Garcinia Cambogia. I have found myself with more energy and also I am sleeping better, which I have ALWAYS had an issue with! Not to mention, I have lost a few pounds due to not overeating, which has always been a habit of mine! I notice that I am much more full a lot quicker since I have started taking these, helping me leave food on my plate. I mentioned this online and received a second bottle for free! Thank you so much for wonderful customer service and for a wonderful product!!
customer_reviews.author: Nats

customer_reviews.title: product works!
customer_reviews.text: I had been dieting for a long time and had hit a plateau. I exercise a lot and eat a low carb, high protein diet but still have trouble losing weight. Mostly I just exercise and diet just to stop gaining weight. I do take other supplements that have helped, eg Cinnamon, Am and Pm FX. Anyway, I got stuck at 144.8lbs and after adding in this product for a month I am now 143.2 lbs. This may not seem like a lot to most dieters but it is a big help to me and so nice to be going in a downward trend again :-) My goal is to achieve my ideal weight of 123lbs by August 1st.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: This really worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: Combined with the Naturewise Garcinia Cambogia, I lost weight within 30 days. My scale is broke but I would say I lost about 10 lbs. These products curbed my appetite and I got full very quickly. I do walk on the treadmill 3-5 times per week for 30 min, but I was already doing that prior to trying these products and I had not lost this kind of weight. One very significant thing I noticed is that I don't look tired anymore...my eyes look bright and my skin appears healthier! Next I will try the Keytones and Garcinia together!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia De La Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Great product with extra energy
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this for about two weeks now, I've noticed a big difference in my energy level. I'm quite active already but this really seemed to give me extra energy on top of what I already have. So after doing my normal routine, I feel less drag and still feel ready to go by bed time. As for weight loss, I've noticed difference in my pants but I avoid the scale so I couldn't tell you specific numbers. I have a regular workout routine and with the extra energy and a little weight loss so far (only two weeks so far), I'd recommend this to anyone questioning if they should or shouldn't.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I saw this product & Garcinia Cambogia on The Dr. Drew Show. He did a blind study that showed it works if you only need to lose a few pounds so I tried it. I am using the 2 products together. I have lost 10lbs in 2 months & would like to lose 15 more. That will be about 10% of my total body weight. It suppresses my appetite & is working for me. It came with a coupon for a free bottle so I contacted them. They are not pushy and don't ask many questions. They seem to genuinely interested in helping you achieve your goals.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M Seabolt

customer_reviews.title: my bad hunger starts after 6 pm when I used to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using green coffee beans extract with chlorogenic acid for over a year now. No weight loss at all. Maybe it's auto-suggestion, but it might have diminished the night cravings a bit so that, under this supplement, I did not gain weight either. I have to lose 20 lbs by all means though, and the only way to accomplish that is by eating much, much less, I know that all too well. I have never hunger pangs during the day, my bad hunger starts after 6 pm when I used to start munching on something all the time. However, I keep on taking this product because of the antioxidants green coffee beans contain.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaLu

customer_reviews.title: Together with Raspberry Ketones
customer_reviews.text: This was the first of weight-loss aids I've tried and I took the Ketones with the Green Coffee extract! I took them faithfully for 2 months and I lost 10 lbs. I take medications with weight-gain side effects, so losing the weight has been extremely difficult. I will probably go back to taking this duo as soon as I'm done going through the Garcinia Cambogia (which works at a much slower pace!) I like the raspberry & coffee combo because it's natural and doesn't upset my stomach and you DON'T need to take them 30 minutes before a meal... most people either forget or take them after they eat. This is an item I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chryssy67

customer_reviews.title: I love Nature Wise Products
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 3 months. I have really seen a lot of benefits. I had a baby about 10 months ago and this product has given me the energy to stick to my workout routine. It also makes me feel full and less hungry so I am able to stick to a good eating plan. While I do not weigh myself often, I have dropped 2 pants sizes since having my daughter. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for that little boost with their weight loss plan. I have tried other Nature Wise products as well and I am always happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This product is a natural way to help weight control. This doesn’t replace exercise but helps it as it should. It’s part of my routine that helped me cut 35 lbs of fat weight and helps me put back on muscle weight.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for 3 weeks synced about a week ago I noticed my waist was getting smaller. Love handles disappearing and definition returning and skin becoming taut again. I just recently had a baby and have just stopped breast feeding so this probably why I have really only noticed results in abdominal area. I love the customer service and the fact that this product is not a stimulant because I am very sensitive to products like that (I have GERD). First week lost 1.5 pounds and then I decided to stop weighing myself because this always drives me insane as my body adjusts and fluctuates. You wont be disappointed and you have nothing to lose but the weight!
customer_reviews.author: nicolemarie118

customer_reviews.title: Headache
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend this product for anybody that suffers from headaches migraines headaches because after taking the recommended dose I started feeling really sick I thought my head was going to burst I started getting a migraine headache that lasted two days I will no longer by retake this product so please use with caution
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the product. I took regularly as directions and didn’t lose any weight.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Helped me control my appetite
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a bottle last week, from the first capsule I took I felt a big difference in my appetite. I have a bad habit of wanting to eat late at night, since I started using the green coffee bean supplement I’ve been able to control this urge to eat at night. It’s working great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Fidae Kassim

customer_reviews.title: Seriously It Works and They Give You a Free Bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product for about two months and I can honestly say that it works. I do workout regularly and I'm already athletic but had about 7 lbs that I wanted to loose. I have already lost about 6 lbs using this, so I'm just about at my goal weight. Also this company is awesome. They give you an offer for a free bottle. You have to speak someone but the lady just wanted to know how I like it and even gave me some tips on how to get the best results. She didn't try to sell me anything and was super nice. My free bottle is in the mail! Try it you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: sweber

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with NatureWise Products!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with NatureWise Green Coffee Been Extract. One of the reasons I purchased NatureWise, instead of other brands sold on Amazon, is because it is formulated in the USA. NatureWise also provides outstanding customer support. I originally called customer support with questions about another one of their products. The company representative was very helpful, and took the time to help me decide which supplement was best for me. She was able to make suggestions based on my individual needs, and called to follow up. I feel this company stands behind their products and makes customer satisfaction a priority.
customer_reviews.author: motherOFyorkies

customer_reviews.title: Can only get a one time free bottle with first purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Quit putting a pamphlet in box of green coffee been, if you can't get another bottle free with second purchase, just a scam to get you to buy more, which was a big procedure to go thru to get the first bottle free! Not a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: NatureWise Green Coffee Bean 800mg Max Potency Extract 50% Chlorogenic Acids is one of the better diet pills on the market that truly works when you follow a weight loss regime of diet and exercise. Will order again !
customer_reviews.author: L. Bertone

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this product
customer_reviews.text: I started using this pills before a week and it is really working!!. I lost 2kilos until now. At the first two days I had a headache,but after that everything was great. Also, it controls my appetite which helps me a lot especially because I really like the food!! Also, the costumer service was very helpful and they answered to my email very fast. BTW, my free bottle is in the way to me 😁 so happy to have it! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Sara's

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I took this along with their Garcinia Cambodia and all I can say is that combo worked better than I ever could have imagined. I did not even have a lot of weight to lose and it's always those last pounds that are difficult. I lost 20 pounds in 3 months which moved my BMI from 23.2 to 18.5. That's huge because I was not really overweight to begin with. I wanted to lose 15-16 pounds. I don't know which one is the appetite suppressant but losing weight has never been this successful for me. I recommend taking both this with the Coffee Bean Extract.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy G.

customer_reviews.title: I am seeing great results so far and intend to continue to use ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this product along with Naturewise CLA 1250 and the Raspberry Ketones Plus+ for a little over a month now. I am seeing great results so far and intend to continue to use all 3 together. There are no side affects at all, I do recommend drinking LOTS of water when you take them. Great stuff, I highly recommend it to anyone trying to get help with their mid section. I should add I am eating healthy 90% of the time along with sticking to a regular exercise program.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I take it in combination with Garcinia Cambogia and it's done what i wanted it to. I've lost 10 pounds and i'm energetic throughout the day and yet not jittery, no stimulant effects whatsoever. i will continue to take this product for as long as i feel necessary. It's actually made life not so stressful for me. I eat healthy, but still enjoy the slightly unhealthy things, just not so much of them. I just DON'T desire to eat half a pizza now, i am satisfied with one or two pieces. I didn't think a product would work so well for me as this one has. :)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and great customer service. I've lost 6 lbs so far and they've even given me a free bottle as an Amazon customer. I didn't even have to pay for shipping, I just spoke with a customer service rep about liking the product and my free bottle is on it's way. I was on a prescription drug called qsymia but it was costing me $125 a month so I decided to try this naturewise green coffee instead. I take two pills at a time to equal the strength of prescription qsymia but it works great and costs wayyy less. It's also all natural. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sayuri

customer_reviews.title: The Best Deal
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product several times and will continue to do so. It is almost impossible to find Green Coffee Bean Extract in 800mg tablets and 50% Chlorogenic Acid.That is the Dr Oz recommendation. This product has these recommended quantities and work great. Don't get confused by the term Svetol and GCA, they are Trade Marks for the ingredient, Chlorogenic Acid. With this product you take 2 pills per day. If you get 400mg tablets you have to take 4 per day. Excellent product!!! I had lost 45 pounds using a diet and was starting to gain back the weight lost. I started using this product and lost the weight gained and am maintaining my weight perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Randell Crees

customer_reviews.title: Helps with chronic constipation.
customer_reviews.text: I got it with another constipation product and I felt it has really help and I have not been off of it for about 6 months and things are working better, hehe if ya know what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It really decreased my cravings and the company is awesome! I received a letter with the bottle saying I could request a free bottle on their website. I followed the instructions and a lady called to talk with me in order to get the free bottle. I told her how pleased I was with the product and we ended up talking like we've known each other for years. They have wonderful people within their company! To my surprise, my free bottle shipped quickly and she even sent me TWO! :-) Definitely helpful for a mother with a daughter that cleans out her pocketbook! lol Thank you Nature Wise!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I lost 4 pounds, and it stayed off. I stopped taking these, and here I am a month later, and the weight is still off. My husband on the other hand, gained it back when he stopped taking it, so I guess it depends on your own metabolism (not to mention the fact that he eats more junk food than I ever will). Overall, we are both delighted with this product. Didn't have to change our diets at all. My only (very minor) issue was that it does contain a small amount of caffeine. That said, the product works best for me in the morning and not later in the day.
customer_reviews.author: IMHO

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used NatureWise's Raspberry Keytones product for about a year, and I’ve been thrilled. Then I tried the Green Coffee Bean Extract 800 product. While I had lost a bunch of weight previously, I continue to lose weight. So now I alternate the 2 products, as I feel my body needs something a little different. So, every day I take 1 or both of your products. Keep up the great work. And thank you! (and thanks for my free 2nd bottle of product!)
customer_reviews.author: drewski in north hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Currently using along side Garcina Cambogia.
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this along with NatureWise's garcinia cambogia. After the first month I'm down about 3 pounds. Id say it definitely gives me a energy boost with no jitters. I do not go through my day without any other forms of caffeine, just these and I'm good to go. While using the supplement I did get in contact with a representative from NatureWise and during my conversation, I received a lot of motivation and tips to hopefully increase my results from the combo of Garcinia Cambogia and Green Coffee Bean. I'll enter my 2nd round of garcinia cambogia and green coffee bean with high hopes and great expectations. Most likely I'll post a follow up afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Bo from San Diego

customer_reviews.title: I like how this gives me a burst of energy without ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that would give me a moderate burst of energy to finish my workday. I like how this gives me a burst of energy without getting jittery; also love how I don't get a caffeine withdrawal when the effect goes away. I have tried other green coffee supplements and either they wouldn't work or would give me a headache so now I just keep getting this one.
customer_reviews.author: Evangelina nunez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent aid for appetite control!
customer_reviews.text: I've found that this supplement works well to help curb appetite, similar to how drinking coffee keeps hunger down. Along with diet/exercise, this is definitely a helpful weight loss supplement for me!
customer_reviews.author: mostlyharmlessx

customer_reviews.title: Now I would like to lose a total of about 30 pounds
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling the past year to drop a quick ten pounds. Instead of losing weight, I have steadily gained about a pound per month over the last year and a half. Now I would like to lose a total of about 30 pounds. Since talking the product, I have noticed a decreased appetite and less urge to binge eat. I started taking prednisone immediately when starting this product and I gained another 5 pounds. Since losing the prednisone 2 weeks ago, I am down 6 pounds total. I feel like this is definitely helping curb my hunger.
customer_reviews.author: noelle lang

customer_reviews.title: A Good Weight Loss Aid
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as a way to trial the claims of being a weight loss aid. After taking the product for over a month I have seen noticeable results in shedding a few pounds. Coupled with a healthier diet, this product is powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I've tried many other products like this but all have left me strung out, unable to function, and completely grumpy. These are the opposite with all the benefits of a lot of energy without having to drink heaps of coffee. When I rang for my free bottle of the product, Maggie, was very patient and kind and offered me sound advice about my weight loss strategy. I'm so happy I did research about this product before buying it. I only hope others achieve the same positive experience.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Edwards

customer_reviews.title: W/ Raspberry Ketones & Garcinia Cambogia Extract, appetite gone, weight loss, not yet
customer_reviews.text: Customer service is beyond awesome. Personable and they actually care about their product helping people. I gave the free bottles to my mother and she is also seeing a difference in her appetite. I have not seen a difference in my weight, however. It has only been a little over a month so I am being patient. Overall, I would recommend this product, along with the Green Bean Extract 800 and Garcinia Cambogia Extract. Without the other two, I cannot say for sure if the appetite suppressant results would be as obvious.
customer_reviews.author: I Am Her

customer_reviews.title: Helps with fasting
customer_reviews.text: I'm an intermittent faster and I use this product to help with early morning craving and to provide a feeling of alertness. It has allowed me to extend my fast beyond 18 hours without having massive cravings.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon Des Vignes

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT! I LOVE IT! I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT! It works wonders and it's rather easy to use, I'm seeing results already. Even more-so, I love NatureWise products, they seem to really care about their customer base, what they put into their products and your personal experience with their products; they've made me a customer for life. Also, inside the package is the ability to receive a bonus bottle ABSOLUTELY FREE, no shipping, no packaging fee... just free. SO be sure to take advantage of the offer.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Burger

customer_reviews.title: Definitely the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I heard about the green coffee weight loss craze a while ago and decided to give it a try. After researching many products I came across this one and started using it about a month ago. It is definitely working for me. My clothes are roomier and my sister remarked that she sees that I've lost some weight already. What I love about this brand is that it includes the required GCA with no fillers, binders and artificial ingredients and at double strength (800 mg). I am a believer in natural products so this was important to me. What's more this is vegetarian and made in the USA to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Chuckiee

customer_reviews.title: Not as hungry
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. I started using it when my sister lost a bunch of weight. She had also altered her diet, but I thought it couldn't hurt to take one more pill daily with my vitamins. When I take it in the morning, I don't feel hungry at all on most days. I have trouble taking it 30 minutes before eating when I am at work, but I feel like I am eating better without even trying. I really do think this stuff works. Hopefully it will keep on working and any loss won't be negated by a rebound weight gain later on down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kay

customer_reviews.title: All positive; no negatives
customer_reviews.text: I haven't taken it long and have only been consistent the past couple of weeks, but I've noticed that my appetite is decreased and my energy level increased since I've been taking this. You can spend a small fortune linking to the "Dr. Oz" promoted brand, or spend a much more reasonable amount with the NatureWise supplement. I believe I've started to lose a little weight but haven't been on the scales yet due to vacationing and company, but I'm looking forward to seeing those numbers drop too =) I also like the Subscribe and Save option ... I don't run out and save a little more money. Yup, it's all good!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Simiskey

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been taking this product long enough to comment on weight loss (a few days)but I can say it does help with surpressing your appetite and food cravings. I also should mention I don't like taking pills but with this product I haven't seen any side affects. Nature Wise has really great customer service, I spoke with Cynthia Rees and she was very nice, and she gave me some helpful tips to ensure that I use the product correctly, which is take the pill exactly thirty minutes before you eat and make sure to drink your water with it. I'll update when I see weight loss.
customer_reviews.author: Prissymarie

customer_reviews.title: I'm Losing Weight
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 64-year-old female and you all know that it's very hard to loose weight at this age. This product is helping me curb my appetite. I have lost 15 pounds in approximately 6 weeks. I need to loose 45 more pounds, but I'm hoping this will help me all the way. I follow the directions exactly. I feel no side effects, no anxiousness. I've tried Weight Watchers before and was always hungry and grumpy. I will start exercising when I reach the 30 pound mark -- or sooner if I experience a slow-down in the momentum. Right now, I'm happy with the result.
customer_reviews.author: ned1644

customer_reviews.title: it is coffee
customer_reviews.text: it is green coffee and will rise your energy level
customer_reviews.author: Rita Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Superior to other brands I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.text: At my age (75) it is difficult to lose weight, but your product helps me to maintain my weight, feel less bloated, and feel less hungry.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking your product, combination of the green coffee bean and the garcinia cambogia, because of the awesome results I saw on my friend, and I am glad I did. I have more energy, I feel better and I am losing weight, there is nothing better than that!! Your products exceeded the expectations I had, I am glad I started taking them and I can't imagine living without them!! My second bottle was free Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: JenAM

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and it seems to be helping with my weight loss!! Great customer service...honestly...fantastic! The company really cares about its customers and wants to make sure they are happy with the product! I have lost 11 pounds in 2 months while taking this for the last month, eating right and exercising regularly. I am a happy customer and will continue using their product. I think I am going to see if they have raspberry ketones as well and get those! Pam Sorrels-Thousand Oaks, CA.
customer_reviews.author: Dunstan Regan

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to use as an appetite suppressant, as I want to maintain my current weight, but curtail my snacking. I've been using it for about 3 weeks now and it has really made a difference. I no longer snack throughout the day, as I'm not hungry and it definitely keeps me energized. Earlier this week, I also received the NatureWise Garcinia Cambogia and Raspberry Ketones to add to the Green Coffee Bean Extract to help with stomach bloating. I spoke with Amy in customer service and she was wonderful in helping me receive a free bottle of each of the products I'm using. I will update my progress in weeks to come. Thank you Amy!!
customer_reviews.author: PurpleRose1118

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE these pills
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these pills. Along with moderate exercise and watching calories, these pills have definitely helped me lose weight. I don't feel hungry all the time, which was a big problem for me, and they give me plenty of energy. I don't even need coffee any more, which is a bonus considering the extra calories I used to consume with creamer and sugar.

customer_reviews.title: Coffe Bean Extract is the BOMB.COM
customer_reviews.text: Both myself and my Boyfriend have been using this for about 3 weeks now and so far I have lost 12 POUNDS!!!! One of my friends recommended this product to me after I told her about wanting to get serious about losing weight and getting healthy. She has had great success with the coffee bean extract as well. I take it as recommended and I drink a lot of water and exercise at least 30 minutes a day. I have so much energy and feel great and I am looking forward to more weight loss with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley T.

customer_reviews.title: No discernible results for me
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would help me get back closer to my weight goals, but found it didn't really do anything for me. I still gave the product three stars, because it seemed to help the first few days with my appetite, but that quickly fell off. It seems like great quality as well, with no odd effects. I really am not the best candidate for this, being only 10-20 pounds from my desired target weight as a 190 lb. male. I think it might work better (like on the ads and TV shows) for those who are much further from their goals, and carry excessive body fat.
customer_reviews.author: W. E. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Weight Loss Supplement
customer_reviews.text: After reading several of the reviews, I decided to try this. Wow. I've been using this so for for only three days, and I've lost 0.6 lbs. Plus, I lost half an inch off my waist. I decided to measure myself when I noticed my pants feeling a little looser. The week's not even over yet. This is great. So far so good. I do exercise with Jillian Michaels and try to watch what I eat as well. Yesterday, I ate an extra 224 calories more than necessary. But so far, I'm impressed with the results. I'll stick with it to see where it goes.
customer_reviews.author: G. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: NatureWise Green Coffee Bean Extract
customer_reviews.text: I started on a quest to lose weight and eat healthy and just in general feel better about a year ago. I lost weight and was feeling good, but needed a boost. I started using NatureWise Green Coffee Bean Extract about a month ago and it has helped me maintain my weight loss and I actually feel I have more energy; with no unwanted side effects. I like the product due to it's all natural base and will continue to use it. As I've reach a plateau in my weight loss strategy, I also feel NatureWise Green Coffee Bean Extract is a good jump start to continue to lose weight.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great. I have used this for a couple of years now, mostly for energy. Seems to work.

customer_reviews.title: Effortless!!!
customer_reviews.text: I weighed 162 lbs three weeks ago. This morning I stepped on the scale and I was 154 lbs. Oh joy!!! I have not excercised due to my hectic schedule (demanding job, single mom). The only thing that I took was the Garcinia Cambogia three times a day and the Green coffee bean twice a day. No side effects at all. I’m also an avid coffee drinker so that in combination with the two supplements didn’t cause any jitters. I’m down 8 lbs in three weeks with no effort at all. Can’t wait to start excercising when my schedule permits... the lbs are going to fly off!

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Can I say this product alone has helped me in losing weight? No, but I'm also doing my own fitness journey outside of supplementation. But has it given me a decent boost of energy to my morning to start my day? Yes, it has. All in all, it's a worthwhile product to try.

I combined it with a healthy diet, no processed foods, low carb. I went off for a few months and the weight is creeping up. I am going to try adding the cambogia extract to my plan, for another two months and see how that works out.

customer_reviews.text: I needed to shed some weight before my wedding in 2 month, and I bought this from Amazon mainly from great reviews. I just used it for 2 1/2 weeks, but I can really tell the difference. I am also taking Naturewise Garcinia Cabogia at the same time, and my body feels lighter. I do think it's done enough I'm going to continue with it now that I'm back home and eating and exercising regularly.

customer_reviews.title: Loose waist bands!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, after three months of battling my post holiday bulge, my waist bands are getting loose! I was exercising and eating a clean diet, but the tight waist bands continued to plague my comfort and appearance. While searching Amazon, I came across Green Coffee Bean Extract. I decided to give it a try. I did not notice any trouble keeping me awake at night, but I take one before lunch and one before dinner. This way, I seem to not want to snack between meals and after dinner. I am pleased and will order again, until I can fit into my favorite jeans.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to try and break through a plateau I had reached with my weight loss and it worked. Since taking the tablets for the last 3 weeks I have averaged over half a kilo loss per week. They are a larger capsule but easy to swallow with no side affects. I have also been taking these tablets in conjunction with the NatureWise Raspberry Ketones Plus+ tablets. If you are looking for that little extra help with your weight loss goals I would definitely recommend this product. Also if you have any questions about the product I found their support department to be very helpful.

customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for a couple of weeks with the garcinia cambogia and am using it religously .I have lost 9 lbs already of course I have cut dpwn on carbs etc and eating late at night. customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!! Safe and effective.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked for me, as a Registered Nurse, I did some research before purchasing the product and I can definitely believe in it (I mean come on.. un-roasted / raw coffee beans? what could be the harm?) I liked that this product, unlike others does NOT have magnesium stearate, silicon dioxide, or titanium dioxide. Bottom line, I was skeptical at first - but since it seemed safe, I tried it and now I find myself recommending it to others. I dropped a few pounds after two weeks of using this product and there are noticeable changes (dropped a pant size, thinner waist, less of a belly.)

customer_reviews.title: Delivers on promise
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in order to help with my blood sugar levels with the chlorogenic acid and i really feel that the product delivers. It did not make me light-headed as other green coffee products do but definitely had an effect significant enough for me to feel a difference. I've been using it steadily every day and have really felt that i had better control of my appetite and no other side effects.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: The green coffee bean extract is great! It's too soon to say if it actually aids in weight loss, but it can't hurt along with a healthy diet and exercise! I did a lot of research and this product is great in maintaining a healthy blood sugar for those with polycystic ovarian syndrome. This alone can help with a huge amount of weight loss! Although it says one capsule contains the same amount of caffeine as a decaf cup of coffee I have noticed myself being more energized for workouts! Nature wise is also great because they will send you a free bottle in return for an honest review!

customer_reviews.text: The changes/improvements I note are: - slimmer silhouette esp. abdomen - dropped 2 dress sizes in 1 month - less interest in carbohydrates - decreased portion size satiety I feel this is a great tool to incorporate into my healthy eating and exercise regimen. During the day, 6 AM - 9 PM, I've always been a clean eater - including sweets in proper portion and control. Thanks to the supplements, I completely stopped late night binges without a conscious effort.

product_meta.title: NatureWise Green Coffee Bean 800mg Max Potency Extract 50% Chlorogenic Acids | Raw Green Coffee Antioxidant Supplement & Metabolism Booster for Weight Loss | Non-GMO, Vegan, & Gluten-Free [1 Month]
product_meta.description:
Green coffee bean extract is a decaffeinated extract of unroasted coffee beans, which have a higher level of chlorogenic acids than roasted beans. Chlorogenic acids are a powerful natural antioxidant and are thought to affect the way the body regulates blood sugar and metabolism, making green coffee bean extract a popular natural weight loss supplement. 

Our formula contains GCA (Green Coffee Antioxidant), a patented, standardized extract valued for its high concentration of chlorogenic acids. Each 800 mg serving of NatureWise Green Coffee Bean Extract contains approximately 20 mg of caffeine, about the same as one cup of decaf coffee.
feature_bullets: NATURAL WEIGHT LOSS SUPPLEMENT: Green Coffee Bean Extract is naturally high in chlorogenic acids, which are thought to act as a natural metabolism booster and fat burner for women and men.
SUPPORTED BY RESEARCH: Trademarked active ingredient GCA (Green Coffee Antioxidant) has been successfully used in a double-blind, placebo-controlled study to support healthy weight management.
#1 BESTSELLER: NatureWise is the leading brand of Green Coffee Bean Extract for Weight Loss, with thousands of satisfied customers.
DECAFFEINATED: Green Coffee Bean Extract pills contain about the same amount of caffeine as one cup of decaf coffee, for powerful benefits without the jitters.

PURE & NATURAL: NatureWise Green Coffee Bean Extract 800 is doctor formulated and third party tested for purity and potency. It is non-GMO, gluten-free, vegan, and contains zero artificial ingredients.
